verses.roman:
cāri-yugāvatāre ei ta' gaṇana
śuni' bhaṅgi kari' tāṅre puche sanātana

synonyms: cāri-yuga-avatāre—of the incarnations in the four different yugas; ei ta' gaṇana—such enumeration; śuni'-hearing; bhaṅgi kari'-giving a hint; tāṅre—unto Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; puche—inquired; sanātana—Sanātana Gosvāmī.
translation: "Thus I have given a description of the incarnations of the four different yugas." After hearing all this, Sanātana Gosvāmī gave an indirect hint to the Lord.
